name: ShieldConfiguration
desc: An object that defines the appearance of a shield to display over an application or website.

items.name: let backgroundBlurStyle: UIBlurEffect.Style?
items.desc: A blur style to apply to the background of the shield.

items.name: let backgroundColor: UIColor?
items.desc: A color for a shield to use in the background blur effect.

items.name: let icon: UIImage?
items.desc: An icon to display in the center of the shield.

items.name: let primaryButtonBackgroundColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The color to fill the contents of the rounded rectangle primary button.

items.name: let primaryButtonLabel: ShieldConfiguration.Label?
items.desc: The label of the topmost rounded rectangle button.

items.name: let secondaryButtonLabel: ShieldConfiguration.Label?
items.desc: The label of the optional secondary button.

items.name: let subtitle: ShieldConfiguration.Label?
items.desc: The subtitle for a shield to display below the title.

items.name: let title: ShieldConfiguration.Label?
items.desc: The title of the shield to display below the icon.

items.name: struct Label
items.desc: The appearance of text labels within a shield.

items.name: init(backgroundBlurStyle: UIBlurEffect.Style?, backgroundColor: UIColor?, icon: UIImage?, title: ShieldConfiguration.Label?, subtitle: ShieldConfiguration.Label?, primaryButtonLabel: ShieldConfiguration.Label?, primaryButtonBackgroundColor: UIColor?, secondaryButtonLabel: ShieldConfiguration.Label?)
items.desc: Creates a shield configuration with the specified values.
